name: Aquanamel® Gloss
description: Dulux Aquanamel® Gloss is a non-yellowing, water-based interior and exterior acrylic enamel that dries to a glossy and durable, chip-resistant finish. Aquanamel® Gloss can be used in most areas were traditional oil-based enamels are applied with the time-saving benefits of an acrylic paint. Aquanamel® Gloss is highly recommended for doors, architraves, skirting boards, internal and external windows, timber trim and walls and is ideal for bathrooms, kitchens and laundries.

name: Super Enamel™ High Gloss
description: Dulux Super Enamel™ High Gloss is a high quality and hard-wearing oil-based enamel. With superior flow and levelling, Dulux Super Enamel™ High Gloss helps achieve a premium smooth finish for doors, walls and trim in your bedrooms, living room, halls, dining room, bathroom, laundry and kitchen.

name: Texture Medium Cover™
description: Dulux Texture Medium Cover™ is ideal for creating a coloured, mottled appearance over brickwork. It is perfect for diffusing, but not completely hiding the brick pattern. It can also be used to create a textured effect over smooth masonry surfaces. A range of effects can be easily achieved by finishing Texture Medium Cover™ with a lambswool hand mitt applicator, sponge, brush or broom.

name: Wash&Wear® Low Sheen
description: Dulux Wash&Wear® Low Sheen is ideal for all interior walls including high traffic areas such as hallways and family rooms and where minimal light reflection is desired. Wash&Wear® 101 Barrier Technology® creates a hard-wearing finish that allows you to wipe away most common marks, scuffs and stains with a wet cloth so your walls will look freshly painted for years.

name: Wash&Wear® Matt
description: Dulux Wash&Wear® Matt provides a stylish, matt finish without compromising on washability or durability. By minimising light reflection, the sophisticated matt finish provides a subtle sheen, hides surface imperfections and softens the effect of glare making it ideal for rooms with large windows or in hallways. It's made with the latest 101 Barrier Technology®, so you can wipe away most common marks, scuffs and stains with a wet cloth and your walls will look freshly painted for years.

name: Wash&Wear® Semi Gloss
description: Dulux Wash&Wear® Semi Gloss provides a mid-level sheen that works well on all walls including frequently cleaned areas and wet areas or as an alternative to enamels on doors and skirting boards. The hard-wearing finish allows you to wipe away most common marks, scuffs and stains with a wet cloth so your walls will look freshly painted for years.

name: Weathershield® Matt
description: Dulux Weathershield® has been specially designed to provide a tough, hard-wearing finish that provides protection from all weather conditions. Formulated with MaxiFlex® Technology to expand and contract with the surface, Dulux guarantees Weathershield® won't peel, flake or blister for as long as you live in your home.
